Description: Gold mummy-scarab inlaid with dark blue glass; back shows stripes of gold with blue inlay between; the legs are indicated in gold on the underside where there is also a gold loop for attachment.
Funder name: With contribution from: Art Fund (as NACF)
With contribution from: British Museum Friends (as British Museum Society)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Martine Marie Pol, Comtesse de Béhague
